jobDescription: FabFitFun is seeking a Director of Data Engineering to lead the development of our real-time self-service data platform. Youll be a technical thought leader and a champion for our data-driven culture as well as manage and grow our data engineering team.  What We’re Like:  A collaborative learning culture: we work as a team to figure out solutions to the technological challenges of the day  We focus on improving our customers experience every day while still taking the time necessary to make sure we do things the best we can  We celebrate innovation and want every person at FFF to have the power to experiment and find novel, effective solutions  What You’ll Do:  Develop and execute on a comprehensive roadmap that serves key business goals such as a self-service data platform to empower the business owners to make data-driven decisions  Work with business stakeholders such as but not limited to BI, Finance, and Product to translate business requirements into technical requirements  Work with the BI Analytics team to enrich and build data sets that enable data-driven decisions across the organization  Work with DevOps and application engineers to ensure data integrity, governance, stability, accessibility, durability, and performance  Recruit and lead a high-performing team of data engineers to execute on your technical strategy and vision  Define development standards, procedures, and guidelines to improve the overall development process  Mentor data engineers on data architecture and best practices  What Youll Bring:  Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related technical discipline (advanced degree preferred)  10+ years of experience in data warehouses, data modeling, systems analysis, and design  At least 5 years of experience in people management and technical leadership role  Strong understanding of data warehouses such as Redshift, Snowflake, and Hadoop  Mastery of ETL tools such as Alooma, Talend, Informatica, Data Stage, and Fivetran  Proficient knowledge BI Analytics tools such as Looker, Tableau, Oracle, Pentaho, and SAP  Mastery of Data Modeling techniques such as Dimensional Modeling, Data Marts, and Data Cubes  Expert in data architecture, design patterns, data warehouses, modeling, and analysis  Expert in SQL and Python (or Java or Scala)  Experience building real-time data pipelines and streaming APIs using technologies such as Spark, Kafka, Samza, Flink, Storm, Heron, and Kinesis  Collaborative leader and mentor  Strong analytical and problem-solving skills  Meticulous attention to detail  Solid organizational and communication skills  Bonus Points:  Relevant e-commerce and/or subscription experience  Strong knowledge of data science  What youll get:  Opportunity to lead the development of real-time, self-service data platform  Ability to build and expand growing data engineering team  Amazing benefits including medical, dental, vision, FSA, and 401k  Unlimited PTO  Catered meals, kitchen stocked with great snacks and drinks  Free FabFitFun subscription and and
